scripts.dev:int: concurrently "dotenv -e .env.int -- next dev" "cd studio && sanity start"
scripts.dev:prd: dotenv -e .env.prd -- next dev "cd studio && sanity start"
scripts.build:int: echo 'Building Sanity to public/studio…' && dotenv -e .env.int -- cd studio && sanity build ../public/studio -y && cd .. && next build
scripts.build:prd: echo 'Building Sanity to public/studio…' && dotenv -e .env.prd -- cd studio && sanity build ../public/studio -y && cd .. && next build
scripts.build: echo 'Building Sanity to public/studio…' && cd studio && sanity build ../public/studio -y && cd .. && next build
